Name: Silver Creek Falls - Chapter 3
About the game: In the third and final installment in the “Silver Creek Falls” trilogy our heroes find themselves entering the belly of the beast to try to find out the sinister truth about this seemingly peaceful college town. True intentions, allegiances and teeth are bared as the stakes are raised in this epic conclusion to this mysterious adventure game. Included is the soundtrack and directors commentary with the game as a complimentary (free) bonus. Start the story here: /
